meanings.definition: Strengthened by applying tension after the concrete has set.
meanings.sent1: The posttensioned bridge stood strong against the wind.
meanings.sent2: The posttensioned beams added extra support to the structure.
meanings.sent3: The posttensioned cables in the building seemed to give it a secret strength.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a posttensioned rope, holding her together in tough times.
meanings.sent5: The posttensioned walls were like a shield, protecting the building from harm.

meanings.definition: The act of reinforcing concrete by applying tension after it has set.
meanings.sent1: The posttensioned of the concrete was crucial for its durability.
meanings.sent2: Engineers carefully planned the posttensioned of the structure to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The posttensioned process was like a hidden dance beneath the surface.
meanings.sent4: The posttensioned work was the final touch that made the building secure.
meanings.sent5: The posttensioned technique was a marvel of modern construction.
